message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.RO, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses a hybrid algorithm that combines Evolutionary Algorithms (EAs) and Deep Reinforcement Learning (DRL) to address the challenges of temporal credit assignment with sparse rewards, lack of effective exploration, and brittle convergence properties. This makes it likely to belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Neural and Evolutionary Computing (cs.NE) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper focuses on continuous control benchmarks, indicating a potential fit for the Robotics (cs.RO) sub-category. Finally, the use of reinforcement learning suggests a potential fit for the Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-category.
